title: Intro to C Programming
description: Comprehensive C language intro with variables, data types, and programming basics. Perfect for beginners!

title: Introduction to Algorithms
description: Explore the fascinating world of algorithms in this introductory course. Learn the basics of algorithm design and analysis.

title: Introduction to C++ for DSA
description: Start with C++ for Data Structures & Algorithms (DSA). Master fundamentals of this powerful language.

title: Basic Data Structures
description: Foundational data structures and algorithms. Build a robust programming foundation.

title: Introduction to OOP Python
description: Discover Python OOP, create modern web apps, front-end, and back-end development skills.

title: Software Engineering
description: Dive into Software Engineering, data analysis, machine learning, and data visualization with Python.

title: AWS, Cloud Computing
description: Explore AWS cloud computing, construct scalable and dependable cloud applications while delving into its intricacies.

title: Database (MySQL)
description: Expertise in MySQL: Learn database design, efficient SQL query writing, and effective data management and retrieval.

title: Problem-Solving Part
description: Enhance problem-solving skills, understand cybersecurity basics, threat detection, encryption, and network security.
